channel.title: Request: Badges and Banner
channel.description:
1. I need a banner for my smf forums. Name is "Project Marcbob" -Please keep the dimensions similar to the banner on these forums.
2. I need some badges. I am using the same theme and text that MoparScape uses (Pokemon and text that look similar). Some badges I could use are "Founder" "Official Server Donator" "Active Member" "Active Poster" "Veteran" "Official Server Moderator" "Official Server Developer" Use W/e Pokemon you want for them :) I don't know exactly what text MoparScape uses but something that looks similar will work I guess.
Thank you to whoever decides to help!

item.title: Request: Badges and Banner
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:2, topic:448031”]I will work on the badges right now

EDIT:

I have the right font and everything, but they aren’t turning out the way I want. I made badges for Moparcraft before, I just can’t figure this one out… :o[/quote]

Appreciated but someone else already got to them. Please don’t waste anymore time on them

Read full topic
